title: Class and instance commands | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Class and instance related commands enable you to view classes and drop an instance of a class.

All classes support CREATE, DROP, and SHOW commands. For more information about available classes, see
SQL class reference.

You can also use SHOW commands to list functions,
procedures, and roles
in a class.
Currently, Snowflake supports the SHOW CLASSES command.
